# MdHeading.Level Property

**Declaring Type:** [MdHeading](../index.md)

Gets the level of the heading, 1 being the top\-most heading.

```csharp
public int Level { get; }
```

## Property Value

int

## Remarks

Value will always be in the range of 1\-6 (inclusive)
